work.title: Coding Expertise for AI Training
work.description_1: Utilized Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF) techniques to enhance machine learning model training, resulting in more efficient learning and improved model performance.
work.description_2: Evaluated AI-generated responses, including JavaScript code, across key criteria (instructions, localization, truthfulness, etc.) to ensure accuracy, code executability, and adherence to prompt requirements, while improving fluency and style.

work.title: Intern PHP Developer
work.description_1: Performed thorough code reviews and debugging, identifying and resolving issues to ensure the stability and performance of the application during the migration process.
work.description_2: Actively pursued continuous learning and development, keeping up-to-date with the latest Laravel updates and best practices to implement innovative solutions and improve existing functionalities.

madVillageGame.title: Mad Village Game
madVillageGame.description_2: Developed and deployed a scalable online board game supporting up to 1,000 concurrent players using Express.js for backend and Vue.js for building a responsive, dynamic frontend.

threadPages.title: Thread Pages

onlineCourses.title: Online Courses Platform
